notes: This script sets up a PBS job array for processing SAM files using tools like Picard, samtools, and bedtools
The script assumes the input SAM files are located in the 'inputDIR' and the output will be written to the 'outputDIR'
The script uses the 'head', 'tail', 'basename', 'sed', and 'wc' commands to manipulate file names and generate PBS commands
The script utilizes 'SortSam.jar', 'MarkDuplicates.jar', and 'CollectInsertSizeMetrics.jar' from Picard to process SAM files
The script uses a custom perl script 'ATAC_BAM_shifter_gappedAlign.pl' to shift BAM alignment coordinates
The script also provides a commented section for sorting and indexing the shifted BAM files using samtools and bedtools
